html:
kuŋakan baldi-mu-l-a-n ukita-n ənu-dʼa-rə-n

trs: The child has to be born — her [the mother's] belly hurts.

html:

srcwordsbare: əbaj dʼo-ja-n adi-kun um-i-ɣna-ra kuŋakan amakan baldi-mča
trs: They drink a little bear bile juice so that the child is born more quickly.

html:

trs: They get up for the night [literally: make a camp for the night], the man chops wood, makes a fire.

html:
ta-duk baldi-dʼa-n
that-ABL be.born-IPFV.[AOR]-3SG
rightsholder: Däbritz, Chris Lasse; Gusev, Valentin; Stoynova, Natalia. 2024. INEL Evenki Corpus. Version 2.0. Publication date 2024-12-31. Archived at Universität Hamburg. https://hdl.handle.net/11022/0000-0007-FE38-D
trs: Then she gives birth.

trs: When it is born, we wash the child and bring it into the yurt [literally: we come in].

html:

trs: His navel will fall off, the child's umbilical cord will heal, then you wash the child and wash yourself.

html:

outside-LAT fire-ACC.INDF light.fire-IPFV-AOR-1PL.IN clean.[NOM] put.on-IPFV-AOR-1PL.IN

trs: We light a fire outside and put on clean clothes.

trs: The cradle is clean, everything is new.

all.[NOM] throw-HAB.DRV-AOR-1PL.IN different-ACC.INDF put.on-IPFV-AOR-1PL.IN

html:

trs: We light the fire and put pine needles on it.

html:
ta-du imtit-ča-ni šaɣnʼan-du ilit-ča-ni manakan
that-DAT/LOC smoke-IPFV.[AOR]-2SG smoke-DAT/LOC stand-IPFV.[AOR]-2SG self.[NOM]

trs: There you are smoked with smoke, you stand alone.

html:
gʼa-du bəɣa-du bajə-nun a-šin-dʼa-ni ta-li
second-DAT/LOC moon-DAT/LOC human-COM1 sleep-INCEP1-FUT.IMM-2SG that-PROL

trs: If the child cannot be born for a long time, if the wife cannot give birth for a long time, [then] the husband splits the tree with a wedge and leaves it with the wedge, the wedge does not take.

html:
hal-tin ətrikan-i ŋat-ča-rə unə baldi-mča
part.[NOM]-3PL old.woman-ACC.INDF call-IPFV-AOR.[3PL] soon be.born-SBJV.[3SG]

trs: Some call for an old woman — so that [the child] is born earlier.

trs: The yurt where the pregnant woman is is not allowed to be entered.

html:
ə-ɣnə-rə tin-a həlbun ašiji-l
NEG-HAB.DRV-AOR.[3PL] let-CNG pregnant.[NOM] woman-PL.[NOM]

trs: No women are allowed to see the pregnant woman.

html:

trs: If [someone] comes to a pregnant woman, they are not let in, they don't talk to the pregnant woman.

html: əɣəna-l-ɣnə-rə-p rušnik-i-tʼ əɣəna-mnə-p rušnik-i-tʼ on ənu-l-dʼa-p əɣənʼa-dʼa-p

trs: We gird ourselves with a towel, we gird ourselves with a towel, as soon as we feel pain, we gird ourselves.

html:
kuŋakan ta-li hərgi-ški buru-ɣnə-rə-n ta-li əɣənʼa-dʼa-ni da uši-la-dʼa-ni
child.[NOM] that-PROL bottom-LAT.ADV fall-HAB.DRV-AOR-3SG that-PROL

trs: Then the baby falls down, then you gird yourself and make a rope.

html:
uši-lan-duk dʼawu-či-dʼa-ni da hənə-r-dʼi-wər hənʼaptan-či-ɣnə-rə-p

trs: You hold on to the rope and kneel down.

html:

trs: A person is born — he has a soul.

omi ugida bu-ɣnə-rə-n
soul.[NOM] God.[NOM] give-HAB.DRV-AOR-3SG
